Package models

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
models.Grid
public class Grid extends Observable
Class to represent the grid of the game This class is responsible for managing the grid of the game, the pieces, the score, the level and the sounds
Since:
2024-04-14
See Also:

  • SoundPlayer
